name: Host
desc: A representation of an individual host on the network.

items.name: current
items.desc: Returns an NSHost object representing the host the process is running on.

items.name: address
items.desc: Returns one of the network addresses of the receiver.

items.name: addresses
items.desc: Returns all the network addresses of the receiver.

items.name: name
items.desc: Returns one of the hostnames of the receiver.

items.name: localizedName
items.desc: Returns the name used as by default when publishing NSNetServices.

items.name: names
items.desc: Returns all the hostnames of the receiver.

items.name: isEqual
items.desc: Indicates whether the receiver represents the same host as another NSHost object.
